    Method
    Description
    private static void
    deleteSelectedPart(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable)
    Function that deletes a selected part from the Main Screen (All Parts Table) Function will not complete and will alert user if the Part is the only associated part to a product
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
    Initializes the Main Screen and sets the Parts and Products tables
    (package private) void

    Sends user to Add Part Screen when clicking on the Add button in the Part section

    partDeleteHandler(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    Deletes the selected part if it is not the only associated part for a specific product when clicking the Delete Button in the Part section
    (package private) void
    partModifyHandler(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    Sends user to the Modify Part screen with the information for the selected part pre-populated when clicking the Modify Button in the Part section
    (package private) void
    partSearchHandler(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    Searches for a part by name or ID when clicking on the Search Button in the Part section
